arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732213700000_z8a9b0c1d", "workspaceId": "ws_1732213700000_e2f3g4h5i", "sessionDescription": "Adding test requirements", "sessionMemory": "Documenting testing expectations", "toolContext": "Appending content", "primaryGoal": "Complete guidelines", "subgoal": "Add testing section"}, "filePath": "/CONTRIBUTING.md", "content": "

## Testing Requirements

### Before Submitting

- All tests must pass
- Code coverage must not decrease
- Add tests for new features

### Running Tests

```bash
npm test
```"}
